Package:Call.description: Calls an exported function from an other Package

Package:Error.description: Logs and formats an error message in the console in Red (the proper and nanos way)

Package:Export.description: ‘Exports’ a function to be called from any other Package

Package:Log.description: Logs and formats a message in the console (the proper and nanos way)

Package:Require.description:
Package:Require(string ScriptFile)
Includes a .lua script file (from the same Package)

Package:RequirePackage.description:
Package:RequirePackage(string PackageName)
Includes another Package in this Package

Package:Warn.description: Logs and formats a warning message in the console in Orange (the proper and nanos way)

Package:SetPersistentData.description: Sets a Persistent Value which will be saved to Disk

Package:GetDirectories.description: Gets a list of all directories in this package, optionally with filters

Package:GetFiles.description: Gets a list of all files in this package, optionally with filters

Package:GetName.description: Returns the name of this Package

Package:GetPath.description: Returns the path of this Package

Package:GetPersistentData.description: Gets all Persistent Values from the Disk

Package:SubscribeLoad.description: Called as soon the package is loaded

Package:SubscribeUnload.description: Called as soon the package is unloaded
